overview: Buddy Guy's Legends club in Chicago is the setting for a tour de force musical lineup featuring country blues virtuoso Keb' Mo', who showcases a wide range of blues styles on songs such as "Am I Wrong" and "Angelina." Billy Branch, Maria Muldaur and Mike Morgan & The Crawl round out the bill, each delivering their uniquely electrifying brand of red-hot blues. Lively music and backstage interviews all add up to an unforgettable evening.
title: Keb' Mo' & Guests
